predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, U.S. Customs and Border Protection will publish in the Federal Register an NPRM or interim final rule modifying de minimis treatment under 19 U.S.C. 1321.
predictions.verification_criteria: A Federal Register entry from CBP/DHS by the deadline labeled 'Notice of Proposed Rulemaking' or 'Interim Final Rule' that changes de minimis eligibility or threshold under 19 U.S.C. 1321. Third-party reports are insufficient.
monitoring_signals: New CBP or DHS entries on federalregister.gov referencing de minimis
OIRA/OMB reginfo.gov status updates for CBP de minimis rules
CBP press releases, USTR announcements, or White House statements on small parcel imports
Carrier and postal service policy updates on U.S.-bound parcels
predictions.rationale: Policy momentum and carrier disruptions suggest imminent formal rulemaking to alter de minimis.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-15, at least one U.S. offshore wind project of ≥ 500 MW will be officially paused, canceled, or have permits suspended by a federal or state authority or by the developer citing regulatory action.
predictions.verification_criteria: A dated public order or press release from BOEM, a state regulator, or the project developer confirming a pause, cancellation, or permit suspension affecting a ≥ 500 MW offshore wind project by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: BOEM docket updates and Federal Register notices
State PSC agenda items and orders related to offshore wind
Developer (e.g., Ørsted, Equinor) earnings calls and press releases
Litigation stays or injunctions affecting project permits
predictions.rationale: Recent federal intervention raises project risk; further regulatory actions are likely near term.

predictions.text: University of Michigan September 2025 preliminary 1-year inflation expectations will print between 2.8% and 3.3%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm the preliminary September 2025 1-year inflation expectations value in the University of Michigan Surveys of Consumers press release on the official website; value must fall within 2.8%–3.3%.
monitoring_signals: AAA national gasoline price trends
Inflation swap pricing and TIPS breakevens
Tariff announcements and import cost developments
UMich preview notes and high-frequency consumer sentiment indicators
predictions.rationale: Easing policy tone offsets tariff and fuel risks, keeping short-term expectations anchored.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, the U.S. 2s10s Treasury yield spread (DGS10 minus DGS2, FRED daily close) will be positive (>0 bps) on at least one trading day.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using FRED daily series DGS10 and DGS2, compute DGS10 − DGS2. Any close > 0.00 percentage points by the deadline satisfies the condition.
monitoring_signals: Moves in 2-year and 10-year Treasury yields
Fed funds/SONIA/SOFR futures pricing of cuts
Key data releases (CPI, PCE, payrolls), and Fedspeak
Treasury refunding announcements and term premium proxies
predictions.rationale: Front-end should lead on cut pricing, enabling a brief bear/bull steepening to positive.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-23 close to 2025-09-30 close, the iShares Transportation Average ETF (IYT) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 2.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use adjusted close prices from a reputable source (e.g., Yahoo Finance). Compute percentage returns over the interval; IYT return minus SPY return must be ≤ -2.0 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: Brent and WTI prices; EIA diesel retail prices
Cass Freight Index and freight spot rates
UPS, FedEx, airline unit revenue and fuel guidance
U.S. customs/de minimis policy changes and shipping delays
predictions.rationale: Fuel cost risk and trade frictions weigh on transports versus broad equities.

predictions.text: By 2025-10-31, the White House will announce a nominee for Director of the Defense Intelligence Agency.
predictions.verification_criteria: An official White House or DoD press release by the deadline naming an individual nominated to serve as DIA Director.
monitoring_signals: White House personnel announcements and nomination trackers
DoD press releases and leadership statements
Senate Armed Services Committee schedules and notices
predictions.rationale: Rapid replacement is typical to stabilize intelligence leadership amid heightened geopolitical tensions.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-23 close to 2025-09-30 close, Alphabet (GOOGL) will outperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF (SPY) by at least 3.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use adjusted close prices from a reputable source. Compute percentage return for GOOGL and SPY over the interval; GOOGL return minus SPY return must be ≥ 3.0 percentage points.
monitoring_signals: Updates on any Apple–Google AI collaboration
Gemini feature launches and model upgrades
Waymo deployment milestones and regulatory developments
Rate moves and growth/tech factor performance
predictions.rationale: Potential Apple-Gemini tie-up and Waymo progress support relative strength in GOOGL.
